name: CleanTube
description:
A clean View of YouTube.com channel home (google homepage style).
My screen is set to 1280X960 so you will have to adjust the search bar and the logo to the left:
in the css, under #masthead-search change the left:450px; for as much as you need, and in the #logo change the left:590px; for as much as you need.
F#^ck youtube beta channel !
